4 LeicaNode::LeicaNode():_nh(ros::this_node::getName())
5 {
6  ROS_DEBUG("[%s] LeicaNode::LeicaNode()",ros::this_node::getName().data());
7  _pub = _nh.advertise<leica_scanstation_msgs::EventerInfo>("/eventer_info",10);
8  _img_pub = _nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Image>("/image",10);
9  _client = _nh.serviceClient<leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile>("/publish_clouds");
10 
11  _counter=0;
12 }

29 void LeicaNode::publishScanPointcloudFile(ros::ServiceClient client, std::string file_name)
30 {
31  leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile srv;

34  client.call(srv);

53 void LeicaNode::openServices()
54 {
55  _srv0 = _nh.advertiseService("connect", &LeicaNode::connectCb,this);
56  _srv1 = _nh.advertiseService("disconnect", &LeicaNode::disconnectCb,this);
57  _srv2 = _nh.advertiseService("convert", &LeicaNode::conversionCb,this);
58  _srv3 = _nh.advertiseService("move", &LeicaNode::moveCb, this);
59  _srv4 = _nh.advertiseService("tilt", &LeicaNode::tiltCb, this);
60  _srv5 = _nh.advertiseService("scan_info", &LeicaNode::scaninfoCb, this);
61  _srv6 = _nh.advertiseService("scan", &LeicaNode::scanCb, this);
62  _srv7 = _nh.advertiseService("cancel", &LeicaNode::cancelCb, this);
63  _srv8 = _nh.advertiseService("pause", &LeicaNode::pauseCb, this);
64  _srv9 = _nh.advertiseService("resume", &LeicaNode::resumeCb, this);
65  _srv10 = _nh.advertiseService("video", &LeicaNode::videoCb, this);
66 }

68 int LeicaNode::bin2ptx(std::string file_name)
69 {
70  CString in_file = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(file_name,".bin").c_str();
71  CString out_file = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(file_name,".ptx").c_str();
72 
73  int r = HXI_ConvertToPtx(&in_file, &out_file);
74 
75  return r;
76 }

78 int LeicaNode::moveMotors(float pan, float tilt)
79 {
80  float angles[2] = {pan,tilt}; // pair of values
81  float *ang;
82 
83  ang = angles;
84 
85  ROS_INFO("Moving to: (%f,%f)",pan,tilt);
86  int r = HXI_GotoAngles(ang);
87  return r;
88 }

110 bool LeicaNode::conversionCb( leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Request &req,
111  leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Response &res)
112 {
113  CString in_file = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(req.file_name,".bin").c_str();
114  CString out_file = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(req.file_name,".ptx").c_str();
115 
116  int r = HXI_ConvertToPtx(&in_file, &out_file);
117 
118  res.success = r==0 ? true : false;
119  res.message = r==0 ? "look at /pointcloud folder" : "failed, please check file name";
120  //todo: mensaje con info mas util
121  return true;
122 }
123 
124 bool LeicaNode::moveCb(leica_scanstation_msgs::MotorPose::Request &req,
125  leica_scanstation_msgs::MotorPose::Response &res)
126 {
127  int r = HXI_FetchAngles();
128 
129  r = moveMotors(req.pan,req.tilt);
130 
131  r = HXI_FetchAngles();
132 
133  res.message = "Moving";
134  res.success = r==0 ? true : false;
135  return true;
136 }

138 bool LeicaNode::tiltCb(std_srvs::SetBool::Request &req, std_srvs::SetBool::Response &res)
139 {
140  int enable = req.data == true ? 1 : 0;
141 
142  ROS_INFO("Setting tilt to %d",enable);
143  HXI_EnableTilt(enable);
144 
145  res.message = "Got it";
146  res.success = false;
147  return true;
148 }

150 bool LeicaNode::scaninfoCb( leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Request &req,
151  leica_scanstation_msgs::PointCloudFile::Response &res)
152 {
153  CString file_path = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(req.file_name,".bin").c_str();
154 
155  int *size;
156  size = new int[2];
157  float *window;
158  window = new float[4];
159 
160  HXI_ReadScanInfo(&file_path,window,size);
161 
162  res.message = "Got it";
163  res.success = true;
164 
165  return true;
166 }
167 
168 bool LeicaNode::scanCb( leica_scanstation_msgs::Scan::Request &req,
169  leica_scanstation_msgs::Scan::Response &res)
170 {
171  int *size;
172  size = new int[2];
173  float *window;
174  window = new float[4];
175 
176  CString file_path = LeicaUtils::getFilePath(req.file_name,".bin",_counter).c_str();
177 
178  ROS_INFO("Saving scan on: %S",file_path);
179 
180  size[0] = req.vertical_res;
181  size[1] = req.horizontal_res;
182  window[0] = req.pan_center;
183  window[1] = req.tilt_center;
184  window[2] = req.width;
185  window[3] = req.height;
186 
187  // Stop video streaming before scan
188  HXI_EndVideo();
189 
190  // Tell user scan range
191  float angles[2];
192  angles[0] = req.width;
193  angles[1] = req.height;
194  HXI_FetchRange(angles);
195 
196  // Start scan
197  HXI_FetchScan(window, size, &file_path);
198 
199  // Save file name to be converted
200  _last_file_name = req.file_name + std::to_string(_counter);
201 
202  _counter++;
203 
204  res.message = "Scanning";
205  res.success = true;
206  return true;
207 }
208 
209 bool LeicaNode::cancelCb(std_srvs::Trigger::Request &req, std_srvs::Trigger::Response &res)
210 {
211  ROS_INFO("Cancel requested ");
212  HXI_Cancel();
213 
214  _counter--; // Last scan was cancelled
215 
216  res.message = "Canceled";
217  res.success = true;
218  return true;
219 }

241 bool LeicaNode::videoCb(leica_scanstation_msgs::MotorPose::Request &req,
242  leica_scanstation_msgs::MotorPose::Response &res)
243 {
244  ROS_INFO("Video starting");
245  HXI_BeginVideo();
246 
247  // ROS_INFO("Video angles");
248  float angles[2] = {req.pan, req.tilt}; // pair of values
249  float *ang;
250  ang = angles;
251  // HXI_FetchVideoAngles(ang);
252 
253  ROS_INFO("Video moving");
254  HXI_MoveVideo(ang);
255 
256  res.message = "Resumed";
257  res.success = true;
258  return true;
259 }
260 
261 void LeicaNode::getImageMsg(sensor_msgs::Image *img_msg)
262 {
263  HxiImageT img; // image for holding scanner data
264  img.size[0] = WIDTH + (3 * WIDTH & 3); // be multiple of 4
265  img.size[1] = HEIGHT;
266  img.data = (HxiPixelT*) malloc(img.size[0] * img.size[1] * sizeof(HxiPixelT));
267  std::memset(img.data, 255, img.size[0] * img.size[1] * sizeof(HxiPixelT)); // initialize on 255
268 
269  HXI_FetchVideo(&img);
270 
271  if (img.data!=NULL)
272  {
273  // Assemble ros img_msg
274  img_msg->height = HEIGHT;
275  img_msg->width = WIDTH;
276  img_msg->encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8;
277  img_msg->step = NUM_CHANNELS*WIDTH;
278 
279  // img_msg->data.resize(WIDTH*HEIGHT*NUM_CHANNELS);
280 
281  // reassigning data from scanner to ros img_msg
282  for (int i = 0; i < (img.size[0]*img.size[1]); i++)
283  {
284  img_msg->data.push_back(img.data[i].b);
285  img_msg->data.push_back(img.data[i].g);
286  img_msg->data.push_back(img.data[i].r);
287  }
288 
289  HXI_FreeImage(&img);
290  }
291 }
